channel.title: Need helping adding customs

item.title: Need helping adding customs
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

[center]ADDING MODELS[/center]

  1. put the models in your models folder, IN .GZ form.
  2. log into server and type “add model ###” <-- replace ### with the model number.
  3. add the ints in class8 or itemdef.
  4. compile
  5. restarn client, and try to pickup the item
  6. done

Read full topic
